## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8dfe091de922cc251578223955b74b56ade98fa67b719bcaa584d3403602f992)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@yu-life/yulife-bdd-framework' @ 0.0.72 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
